value.name: Protesters briefly shut down Winchester Road on anniversary of Darrius Stewart's death
value.description: Darrius Stewart was shot and killed by a Memphis police officer following a traffic stop. He was unarmed but had several outstanding warrants.

value.name: Protesters block lanes of traffic on 5th anniversary of officer-involved shooting
value.description: MEMPHIS, Tenn. — Friday marked five years since a Memphis police officer shot and killed 19-year-old Darrius Stewart, and protesters briefly scuffled with police during a protest to mark the ...

value.name: Family of Darrius Stewart, teen shot and killed in 2015 by former Memphis Police officer, wants case to be reopened
value.description: Friday marks five years since the death of Darrius Stewart, and his family has made a public push to reopen the case. Former Memphis Police Officer Connor Schilling shot Stewart twice July 17, 2015, during a traffic stop and arrest in Hickory Hill.

value.name: Lawsuit filed in police shooting of man in Memphis
value.description: MEMPHIS, Tenn. — A federal civil rights ... The lawsuit filed on behalf of Darrius Stewart’s parents comes almost a year after he was shot by Officer Connor Schilling as the officer tried ...

value.name: Darrius Stewart's mother: 'The struggle for justice continues'
value.description: U.S. Department of Justice announced that no federal civil rights charges will be filed against former Memphis Police Department Officer Connor Schilling, who shot and killed Darrius Stewart ...

value.name: Darrius Stewart's family continues quest for justice
value.description: MEMPHIS, TN (WMC) - The family of Darrius Stewart is not giving up in its quest for justice in his death. Darrius Stewart was 19 years old when he was shot and killed by Memphis police officer ...

value.name: Protest of Minneapolis man's death blocks Memphis street
value.description: MEMPHIS, Tenn. (AP) — Police blocked a main thoroughfare in Memphis, Tennessee, after protesters gathered outside a police precinct to voice their anger at the death of a handcuffed black man ...
